biotools.summary: The SiMMap server statistically derives site-moiety maps which describe the relationship between moiety preferences and the physico-chemical properties of the binding site. Users input the interaction profiles of a query target protein and its docked compound.

bioschemas.name: SiMMap
bioschemas.summary: The SiMMap server statistically derives site-moiety maps which describe the relationship between moiety preferences and the physico-chemical properties of the binding site. Users input the interaction profiles of a query target protein and its docked compound.
